title: ERROR blocks: Skipping deposit: could not verify deposit data signature: signature did not verify
body:
Starting the latest 1.0.0 release cb045dd0e360192fb9e46314b3954f3bf58f4871 with docker or ./prysm.sh looks like this for me, tested on 2 different machines:

```
Starting Prysm beacon-chain 
2020/04/15 00:13:30 maxprocs: Leaving GOMAXPROCS=4: CPU quota undefined
[2020-04-15 00:13:30]  WARN flags: Using default mainnet config
[2020-04-15 00:13:31]  INFO node: Checking DB database-path=/home/dk/.eth2/beaconchaindata
[2020-04-15 00:13:31]  INFO node: Starting beacon node version=Prysm/Git commit: cb045dd0e360192fb9e46314b3954f3bf58f4871. Built at: 2020-04-14 20:29:25+00:00
[2020-04-15 00:13:31]  INFO blockchain: Waiting to reach the validator deposit threshold to start the beacon chain...
[2020-04-15 00:13:31]  INFO rpc: RPC-API listening on port address=0.0.0.0:4000
[2020-04-15 00:13:31]  WARN rpc: You are using an insecure gRPC connection! Provide a certificate and key to connect securely
[2020-04-15 00:13:31]  INFO powchain: Connected to eth1 proof-of-work chain endpoint=wss://goerli.prylabs.net/websocket
[2020-04-15 00:13:47] ERROR blocks: Skipping deposit: could not verify deposit data signature: signature did not verify
[2020-04-15 00:13:47] ERROR blocks: Skipping deposit: could not verify deposit data signature: signature did not verify
[2020-04-15 00:13:47] ERROR blocks: Skipping deposit: could not verify deposit data signature: signature did not verify
[2020-04-15 00:13:47] ERROR blocks: Skipping deposit: could not verify deposit data signature: signature did not verify
[2020-04-15 00:13:47] ERROR blocks: Skipping deposit: could not verify deposit data signature: signature did not verify
[2020-04-15 00:13:47] ERROR blocks: Skipping deposit: could not verify deposit data signature: signature did not verify
[2020-04-15 00:13:47] ERROR blocks: Skipping deposit: could not verify deposit data signature: signature did not verify
[2020-04-15 00:13:47] ERROR blocks: Skipping deposit: could not verify deposit data signature: signature did not verify
[2020-04-15 00:13:47] ERROR blocks: Skipping deposit: could not verify deposit data signature: signature did not verify
[2020-04-15 00:13:47] ERROR blocks: Skipping deposit: could not verify deposit data signature: signature did not verify
[2020-04-15 00:13:47] ERROR blocks: Skipping deposit: could not verify deposit data signature: signature did not verify
[2020-04-15 00:13:47] ERROR blocks: Skipping deposit: could not verify deposit data signature: signature did not verify
[2020-04-15 00:13:47] ERROR blocks: Skipping deposit: could not verify deposit data signature: signature did not verify
```

This goes on forever, with about 100 of those lines per second.
Fixed in #5431. Please update your client to use v1.0.0-alpha.1. Thanks!
